com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.SlideoutControl

Class SlideoutPanelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.SlideoutControl.SlideoutPanelController

  • public class SlideoutPanelController
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows interaction with a Modular Slideout Panel layout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SlideoutPanelController(android.widget.RelativeLayout linkedView, int width, int BGColor, int animTime)
      Sets up a new instance of this object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAnimTime()
      Gets the current animation delay time.
      int getBGColor()
      Gets the current background color of this slideout panel.
      int getWidth()
      Gets the current width of this slideout panel.
      void setBGColor(int color)
      Sets the background color of the slideout panel.
      void setWidth(int width)
      Sets the desired width of the slideout panel.
      void switchState()
      Switches the visibility state of the overlay, running all associated animations.
      void switchStateNoAnim()
      Switches the visibility state of the overlay, skipping all animations that would normally run.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlideoutPanelController

        public SlideoutPanelController(android.widget.RelativeLayout linkedView,
                               int width,
                               int BGColor,
                               int animTime)
        Sets up a new instance of this object.
        Parameters:
        linkedView - a RelativeLayout representing the desired linked slideout panel layout. This view's Context will be used to set default properties for this object.
        width - the desired width for the slideout panel in pixels. Setting this to 0 or less will use the currently set value in the linked View.
        BGColor - the background color for the linked slideout. Setting this to 0 or less will use the corresponding default color value specified in the colors.xml file.
        animTime - the duration in milliseconds of all animations that will fire when extending or retracting the panel. Setting this to 0 or less will default to a value of 250ms.

    • Method Detail

      • switchState

        public void switchState()
        Switches the visibility state of the overlay, running all associated animations.

      • switchStateNoAnim

        public void switchStateNoAnim()
        Switches the visibility state of the overlay, skipping all animations that would normally run.

      • setBGColor

        public void setBGColor(int color)
        Sets the background color of the slideout panel. Setting this to -1 will use the default color set incolors.xml.
        Parameters:
        color - the resource ID of the color to use as the background

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Sets the desired width of the slideout panel. Values below 0 will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the panel in pixels

      • getBGColor

        public int getBGColor()
        Gets the current background color of this slideout panel.
        Returns:
        the resource ID of the current background color. The returned value will directly reflect the actual color, as the value is sourced from the linked view itself.

      • getAnimTime

        public int getAnimTime()
        Gets the current animation delay time.
        Returns:
        the animation delay time in milliseconds

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Gets the current width of this slideout panel.
        Returns:
        the width in pixels. The returned value will directly reflect the actual width, as the value is sourced from the linked view itself.
